MemoryInfobox.name: Again, 'Maláka'?!
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra received another letter from Aiantides|Aiantides the Proud, who bore more treasures and... demands.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Again, ''Maláka''?!''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra received another letter from [[Aiantides]] the Proud.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra returned to the [[Small farm|farm]] formerly used by the [[Order of Hunters]] member [[Bubares]] as a recruitment ground. Inside the storage hut, she found a letter. :'''Thanks Again, ''Maláka''?!'''
''[[Eagle]] Bearer?! How dare you liberate my brother's [[Goat farm|farm]] from [[Order of the Ancients|goat-blood-drinking-fools]]! I, [[Aiantides]] the Proud, will never be indebted to anyone. ''Maláka''! Your altruism is driving me to the brink of poverty!

You will find treasure on the islets of [[Makedonia]] as a final thank you. Now enough, Eagle Bearer, please! I'm leaving Makedonia and I look forward to not seeing you again.'' Kassandra headed south to the islets of Makedonia, in the middle body of water of the [[Triple Peninsula of Chalkidike]]. [[Ikaros]] helped her scout out each islet. [Large middle islet] *'''Kassandra:''' ''This looks like the place.'' On the large middle islet, she eliminated a group of bandits looking for the treasure before claiming the pouch herself. She then proceeded to the rest of the islets. [Small middle islet] *'''Kassandra:''' ''This is it.'' The small middle islet was only a short swim from the larger one to its west. [East islet] *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm where I need to be.'' On the east islet, Kassandra slew a couple of bears before claiming the treasure cache. [Southwest islet] *'''Kassandra:''' ''Here we are.'' On the southwest islet, Kassandra faced some temperamental chickens. From the fourth cache, she recovered a pair of [[Grocer's Gauntlets|gauntlets]] and a [[Hammer of Hemorrhaging|warhammer]] and concluded her treasure hunt.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered the treasure left behind by [[Aiantides]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra returned to the [[Small farm|farm]] formerly used by the [[Order of Hunters]] member [[Bubares]] as a recruitment ground. Inside the storage hut, she found a letter.

:'''Thanks Again, ''Maláka''?!'''
''[[Eagle]] Bearer?! How dare you liberate my brother's [[Goat farm|farm]] from [[Order of the Ancients|goat-blood-drinking-fools]]! I, [[Aiantides]] the Proud, will never be indebted to anyone. ''Maláka''! Your altruism is driving me to the brink of poverty!

You will find treasure on the islets of [[Makedonia]] as a final thank you. Now enough, Eagle Bearer, please! I'm leaving Makedonia and I look forward to not seeing you again.''
Kassandra headed south to the islets of Makedonia, in the middle body of water of the [[Triple Peninsula of Chalkidike]]. [[Ikaros]] helped her scout out each islet.
On the large middle islet, she eliminated a group of bandits looking for the treasure before claiming the pouch herself. She then proceeded to the rest of the islets.
The small middle islet was only a short swim from the larger one to its west.
On the east islet, Kassandra slew a couple of bears before claiming the treasure cache.
On the southwest islet, Kassandra faced some temperamental chickens.
From the fourth cache, she recovered a pair of [[Grocer's Gauntlets|gauntlets]] and a [[Hammer of Hemorrhaging|warhammer]] and concluded her treasure hunt.
